column4: hi i have a Epson CX6000 printer/scanner.. i know the scanner should work under SANE but i am not finding any good docs on how to get it going.. could someone please help me out?
sorry, I don't know your printer, but I'm curious, how old is it?
pretty newish i guess... its my dads, im just trying to get it going
sane-find-scanner  shows: found USB scanner (vendor=0x04b8, product=0x082e) at libusb:004:004
